customer_name: Your Personal Pet Travel Agent Llc
site_name: YOUR PERSONAL PET TRAVEL AGENT LLC

citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1450 on
20-JUN-17. We went to the licensee's house and no one answered. I called the licensee and left a message on
her voicemail. We waited 30 minutes. I called her again and she did not answer. We then left.
End of report.
Additional Inspectors
Sime Debra, Veterinary Medical Officer

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1450 on
20-JUN-17.  We went to the licensee's house and no one answered.  I called the licensee and left a message on
her voicemail.  We waited 30 minutes.  I called her again and she did not answer.  We then left.
End of report.
Additional Inspectors
Sime Debra, Veterinary Medical Officer
